basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: IT Project Manager | MSP • Microsoft 365 • Azure • Client Onboarding
basics.summary: Experienced IT Project Manager and former MSP Help Desk Manager with a background in overseeing client migrations, Microsoft 365 and Azure implementations, and network/server upgrades. Skilled at planning and executing technical projects, managing teams, and fostering strong client relationships. Adept at balancing budgets, timelines, and deliverables while ensuring seamless communication between technical and non-technical stakeholders.

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services (Brightside SaaS Platform)
highlights: Maintained and enhanced enterprise Java/GWT application, refactoring legacy code and implementing test-driven development
Co-led front-end migration from GWT to Vue.js, modernizing client interfaces
Developed and maintained multiple APIs (REST, GraphQL, custom) to support client integrations
Implemented automated testing pipelines to ensure reliable deployments
Managed deployments using Docker and cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalable and stable environments
Authored technical documentation and mentored junior developers on full-stack best practices

work.name: AAM, USA
highlights: Co-designed and built React/TypeScript point-of-sale platform with responsive, user-friendly interfaces
Redesigned and rebuilt checkout/cart system, improving UX and maintainability
Developed backend services and APIs using PHP, JavaScript, and MySQL within a custom MVC framework
Collaborated with 10-person team using GitHub, Asana, and Agile workflows
Implemented unit and integration tests to ensure code quality

work.name: Unbound Digital
highlights: Managed client-facing IT projects including full server migrations, Microsoft 365 transitions, Azure AD deployments, Intune rollouts, and network upgrades
Planned and coordinated migrations from on-prem servers to cloud-based infrastructure, ensuring minimal downtime and seamless client adoption
Led and grew the Help Desk team from 1 to 5 members, overseeing scheduling, KPIs, and workflow improvements
Acted as primary client liaison during onboarding and project execution, translating technical requirements into clear, actionable plans
Collaborated with engineers, vendors, and stakeholders to track deliverables, budgets, and risks throughout project lifecycles
Used PSA tools (Autotask, Solarwinds, RepairShopr) to manage tickets, projects, and resource allocation

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Implemented CAD/CAM and 3D printing systems, supporting precise technical workflows
Maintained lab computer systems and trained staff in software use

work.name: Gray Station Dental
highlights: Led 3-person team coordinating clinical operations and schedules
Managed equipment installs and documentation exceeding compliance standards
